title: My LP gain is weird

embed.description: bloodyloler / Gold 4 23LP / 182W 148L Win Ratio 55% / Vladimir - 21W 14L Win Ratio 60%, Kled - 19W 15L Win Ratio 56%, Fiora - 21W 9L Win Ratio 70%, Hecarim - 14W 11L Win Ratio 56%, Soraka - 15W 9L Win Ratio 63%

body: I am not sure what is going on. It is almost the end of season and I want to get some LP. When I was G5 I was getting 25 LP and I lost only 16 LP per game but now in G4 I am only getting 12 LP and I loze 16 LP per lost. I didnt get bad over night my K.D.A is amazing. I contacted riot but they said it is the system that thinks I deserve this elo.can someone help me out here. Did any of you guys have same issue?

replies.body: When you were getting 25 LP for wins, it was because the system thought you should be placed higher so it was trying to push you higher. Now that you're about leveled out, it's giving you less LP because the matches are relatively even.

It's due to the MMR clamp that moves, grows, shrinks, and expands as you progress through matches.

League and Division standings are really just a snapshot and a means of governing End of Season rewards.

Your MMR is what decides your gains and losses.

The easiest way to see the best gains is to consistently excel in your games and win consistently.

Don't worry about your Tier and Division.
